title: Need a table view for the Cloud panel
description: Need a table view of the cloud panel; the current graph thing looks cool with a small number of collections but quickly becomes onerous to manage with many collections and/or collections having many shards / replicas. I added some basic nav (paging / filtering) in SOLR-5810, but need to add a more functional table view of the cluster state.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: FWIW, Currently Upayavira is working on porting the Admin UI over to Angular JS. So if anyone picks this up, we should consider whether to put it in the old or new versions.

comments.author: Noble Paul
comments.content: I have a problem with the current graphical view that I am unable to copy the replica ip/hostname
